member.name: T:BinaryInsertion.BitMath
member.summary: BitMath class provides basical bit operations.

member.name: M:BinaryInsertion.BitMath.BitInsertion(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: BitInsertion is the method which translate both integer numbers into binary form and then insert the first one into another one. You should specify insertion parameters 'i' ang 'j'.
member.param: Number which service such as platform for insertion
Number which you want to insert into 'targetNumber'
member.returns: New integer which is obtained by inserting.
